controls.name: left
controls.description: Specifies x₁ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂

controls.name: top
controls.description: Specifies y₁ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂

controls.name: right
controls.description: Specifies x₂ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂; if x₂<0, it is replaced with dimX+x₂ (where dimX is image width); ignored if width>0

controls.name: bottom
controls.description: Specifies y₂ (in pixels or percents) for submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂; if y₂<0, it is replaced with dimY+y₂ (where dimY is image height); ignored if height>0

controls.name: width
controls.description: If width>0, it overrides x₂ above and specifies result width x₂−x₁+1 (in pixels or percents) of submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂; ignored if zero

controls.name: height
controls.description: If height>0, it overrides y₂ above and specifies result height y₂−y₁+1 (in pixels or percents) of submatrix x₁≤x≤x₂, y₁≤y≤y₂; ignored if zero

controls.name: outsideColor
controls.caption: Outside color
controls.description:
If submatrix is not fully inside the source matrix (for example, x₁<0), it is supposed that the space outside the source matrix is filled by this color.
See supported color formats in "Create constant matrix" function.

controls.caption: Use GPU
controls.name: useGPU
controls.hint: Use OpenCV GPU optimization when possible
